comments:

4)Using the Properties view, change the "Derived by:" value to "extension".

Created an attachment (id=21082)
fix for NPE

It is still odd that the Schema Editor should allow an extension or restriction
to a type when no base type is specified. I don't know if the UI is designed to
prevent the user from introducing errors into the schema or not.
That's a good point Gary. We should fix the UI to restrict that.
Hi Goren, thanks for the patch.  It's now checked in.
Patch applied and released to HEAD.
